DOC.brief_title: Validation Newly Developed Liquid Jet Aesthesiometer
DOC.detailed_description: Currently , aesthesiometer available delivers reliable repeatable measurement ocular surface sensitivity routine clinical setup . The commercially available Cochet- Bonnet aesthesiometer use tactile-mechanical stimulus ( tip nylon thread ) , cause microerosion apply corneal surface . Additional disadvantage represent poor stimulus reproducibility , limited stimulus bandwidth influence humidity age bend capibility nylon thread . For research purpose prototypes non-contact air aesthesiometers ( eg Murphy et al . Belmonte et al ) use . This study aim correlate ocular surface sensitivity measurement newly develop prototype , liquid jet aesthesiometer , non-contact air jet aesthesiometer Murphy et al . 1996 explore repeatability measurement . In repeated measure design 60 subject participate corneal sensitivity measurement two appointment describe aesthesiometer .
